mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Roberts, Benjamin Stone to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Roberts, Benjamin Stone
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 3 1863. By Telegraph from Burnt Bridge Barracksville 3 1863. I left one company Capt Scott at Cameron it having imperfect & useless arms one company near Littleton Lieut Moore in command is in the same condition. I have three 3 companies here one 1 four 4 miles east of Mannington one 1 two 2 miles west two 2 at churchs & one 1 at Littleton in all Eight companies numbering in all about two hundred [page 2] are collected. Ohio must turn out to protect Parkersburg BS Roberts Brig Genl Comdg 117De35pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Roberts, Benjamin Stone
Barrackville, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
